levels.description:
Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</> and ATK gradually increases up to <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>
<$ba.charged>Charged</> effect: Every attack increases the damage taken by the target from Carnelian by <@ba.vup>{attack@damage_scale:0%}</> (stacks up to <@ba.vup>5</> times), lasting until the end of the skill
